metadata.description: General Orders from President Manuel L. Quezon (dated April 21, 1942) issued by Major General Basilio J. Valdes awarding Colonel Manuel Nieto and Lieutenant Colonel Jaime C. Velasquez the Distinguished Service Star of the Philippines for their distinguished service in positions of major responsibility transporting President Quezon, his family, members of the Cabinet and other members of his party from the Philippines to Melbourne, Australia.Â
metadata.subject: Basilio Valdes
metadata.title: General Order No. 2 awarding Colonel Manuel Nieto and Lieutenant Colonel Jaime C. Velasquez the Distinguished Service Star of the Philippines
metadata.subject: Manuel L. Quezon
